welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vero Beach South, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our vibrant community and soak in all the beauty it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vero Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Vero Beach Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Lucie County Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St Lucie County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
